articles.description:
McDonald's introduces new Special Edition Gold Sauce, the chain's take on gold barbecue sauce, for a limtied time at participating locations nationwide starting Wednesaday, September 3, 2025.

McDonald's describes the new sauce as "a harmonious blend of vinegary North Carolina BBQ sauce infused with notes of honey, smoke and mustard." A gold barbecue sauce is a mustard-based barbecue sauce that originates from South Carolina.
Special Edition Gold Sauce is meant to pair well with the chain's McCrispy chicken and is featured in three new menu items:
- Special Edition Gold Snack Wrap - A McCrispy Strip, Special Edition Gold Sauce, shredded cheese, and shredded lettuce, wrapped in a soft flour tortilla.
- Bacon Special Edition Gold McCrispy - A McCrispy chicken filet, Special Edition Gold Sauce, applewood-smoked bacon, and crinkle-cut pickles, served on a toasted potato roll.
- Bacon Special Edition Gold Deluxe McCrispy - A McCrispy chicken filet, Special Edition Gold Sauce, applewood-smoked bacon, lettuce and tomato, served on a toasted potato roll.
You can also get a dipping cup of the new sauce with an order of McCrispy Strips or Chicken McNuggets.
Photo via McDonald's.
Read more at Brand Eating!
articles.title: McDonald's Unveils New Special Edition Gold Sauce

articles.description:
Captain D's introduces new Batter Dipped Shrimp, which gives shrimp the same treatment as the chain's signature Batter Dipped Fish.

Available for a limited time now through October 26, 2025, the new fried shrimp offering is dipped in a savory and slightly seasoned batter that's made in-house each day.
It's featured in the Batter Dipped Shrimp, Fish & Fries Meal, which includes four Batter Dipped Shrimp, a piece of Batter Dipped Fish, and fries or a classic side of your choice for $5.99 at participating locations.
Batter Dipped Shrimp is also available as part of The Sampler, a Batter Dipped Duo Meal, and the Ultimate Seafood Platter.
Photo via Captain D's.
Read more at Brand Eating!
articles.title: Captain D's Launches New Batter Dipped Shrimp

articles.description:
Denny's revamps its "5 Slams Starting at $5" menu to add three new dishes: the Grand Slam Burrito, BLT&E Slamwich, and 2-Egg Breakfast Slam. The menu is so-named because includes five Slams ranging from $5 to $10 (prices may vary).

Here's what you can expect from the 5 Slams Starting at $5 line-up:
- New Grand Slam Burrito - Applewood-smoked bacon, sausage crumbles, scrambled eggs, hashbrowns and melted cheese, wrapped up in a warm flour tortilla and served with a side of salsa.  
- New BLT&E Slamwich - Four strips of applewood-smoked bacon, a cooked-to-order egg, lettuce, tomato, and mayo on toasted sourdough. The sandwich is served with a side of hash browns or fries. 
- New 2-Egg Breakfast Slam - Two eggs served with hash browns and toast.
- Everyday Value Slam - Two buttermilk pancakes or two slices of French toast served with two eggs and hash browns.
- Super Slam - Tow buttermilk pancakes, two eggs, two strips of applewood-smoked bacon, two sausage links, and hash browns.
The new lineup is available now through October 28, 2025 at participating Denny's restaurants nationwide.
Photo via Denny's.
Read more at Brand Eating!
articles.title: Denny's Changes Up Its "5 Slams Starting at $5" Lineup with New Grand Slam Burrito and More

articles.description:
Popeyes updates its bone-in wings to swap its spicy Ghost Pepper Wings with a mild marinated base that features "a savory blend of Louisiana seasonings." Ghost Pepper is now available as a new dry rub.

The new wing lineup includes three sauce flavors (Signature Hot, Sweet 'N Spicy, and Honey BBQ) and four new dry rubs (the previously mentioned Ghost Pepper plus Lemon Pepper, Garlic Parm, and Buffalo). Here's what you can expect from each flavor:
- Signature Hot - Cajun hot sauce with a hint of sweetness.
- Sweet 'N Spicy - A glaze featuring chili, garlic, and ginger.
- Honey BBQ - A bold, rich, and tangy Honey BBQ sauce.
- New Ghost Pepper Dry Rub - A savory blend of classic Louisiana seasonings and Ghost Pepper.
- New Lemon Pepper Dry Rub - A sweet and tangy lemon pepper seasoning.
- New Garlic Parm Dry Rub - A savory blend of parmesan cheese and garlic.
- New Buffalo Dry Rub - "Classic buffalo flavor coats a crisp wing to create the perfect mix of flavor and heat."
Popeyes' wing prices start at $5.99 for six.
To promote the wing changes, Popeyes has partnered with NFL quarterback Baker Mayfield to offer a new, limited-time deal: Starting September 4, the Monday after Baker Mayfield scores a touchdown in an NFL game this season, Popeyes reward members can get a free 6-piece wings with any $10+ digital order made via the Popeyes app or website. The promotion runs through January 4, 2026.
Photo via Popeyes.
Read more at Brand Eating!
articles.title: Popeyes Updates Wings with Milder Base and New Flavors

articles.description:
Burger King launches the new Crispy Onion Whopper as the latest burger spurred by its "Whopper by You" platform. The chain also brings back Cini Minis for a limited time.

The Crispy Onion Whopper features a quarter-pound, flame-grilled beef patty served with lettuce, tomato, mayo, American cheese, bacon, pickles, breaded onion rings, fried onion crisps, and BBQ sauce on a toasted sesame seed bun. For smaller appetites, it can also be ordered as a Whopper Jr.
Cini Minis are bite-sized cinnamon rolls served with a sweet icing dipping sauce. You get four in an order.
Prices vary, but a Crispy Onion Whopper is $7.99 in Los Angeles, while the Whopper Jr. version is $4.79. An order of Cini Minis is $2.49 here.
Burger King's "Whopper by You" platform solicits fan creations for potential new Whopper varieties.
Photo via Burger King.
Read more at Brand Eating!
articles.title: Burger King Debuts New Crispy Onion Whopper; Brings Back Cini Minis

articles.description:
Smoothie King ventures beyond the familiar confines of its smoothies and smoothie bowls with the launch of its first-ever food menu. According to the chain, the new food items are meant to pair well with its smoothies.

The new "Power Eats" menu is being introduced with a staggered launch, with a set of items available now and additional items to follow in early 2026. The items available now at all Smoothie King shops include:
- Peanut Butter Toast - Toasted 8-grain bread layered with all-natural peanut butter, bananas, strawberries, blueberries, and a honey drizzle.
- Chocolate Hazelnut Toast - Toasted 8-grain bread layered with chocolate hazelnut spread, strawberries, blueberries, and topped with Purely Elizabeth granola.
- Avocado Toast - Toasted 8-grain bread topped with fresh avocado …
articles.title: Smoothie King Introduces Its First-Ever Food Menu

articles.description:
Haagen-Dazs reveals its 2025 Pumpkin Spice Collection for this fall, arriving September 2, 2025, at the brand's ice cream shops nationwide.

This year's seasonal pumpkin spice offerings include:
- Pumpkin Spice Shake - Dulce de Leche ice cream blended with pumpkin puree, topped with whipped cream and a dusting of pumpkin pie spices.
- Pumpkin Spice Dazzler - Dulce de Leche ice cream layered with caramel sauce and crunchy cinnamon cookie pieces, sprinkled on top with warm pumpkin pie spices.
- New Pumpkin Spice Dipped Waffle Cone - A Pumpkin Spice Waffle Cone dipped in white chocolaty chips and rolled in cinnamon cookies and pumpkin pie spices. It comes filled with your choice of ice cream.
Photo via Haagen-Daz.
Read more at Brand Eating!
articles.title: Haagen-Dazs Reveals 2025 Pumpkin Spice Menu

articles.description:
Taco Bell's Cheesy Melty Grilled Steak Burrito is a value-priced offering featuring marinated grilled steak, seasoned rice, a three-cheese blend (mozzarella, cheddar, and pepper jack), reduced-fat sour cream, and Creamy Jalapeno Sauce, wrapped up in a soft flour tortilla.

I bought one for $3.29.
The burrito had a nice heft to it. It was nicely folded and tightly rolled.
There was an even, though somewhat sparse, distribution of mildly seasoned steak inside. Unfortunately, the distribution of the sour cream and Creamy Jalapeno Sauce was not so even. My initial bites of the burrito were full of sour cream, while the Creamy Jalapeno Sauce was gathered at the other end. So I was mostly tasting one sauce or the other in many bites. There's a mild heat from the Creamy Jalapeno Sauce to go with a jalapeno-inflected mayo base.



The second flavor driver of the burrito was the seasoned rice, which had a nice flavor, but I would have liked a bit more presence from the steak.
The cheeses provided a nice melt and stretch, but didn't make much of a showing in the taste department. Although it features in the name, there wasn't a whole lot of cheese to go around.



Overall, Taco Bell's Cheesy Melty Grilled Steak Burrito made for a filling meal for an affordable price. Flavor-wise, it was overly familiar and light on steak. If we were being more honest with names, it would be the "Saucy Rice Flecked with Steak Burrito."
Nutritional Info - Taco Bell Cheesy Melty Grilled Steak Burrito
Calories - 500
Fat - 23g (Saturated Fat - 10g)
Sodium - 1160mg
Carbs - 49g (Sugar - 4g)
Protein - 21g
Read more at Brand Eating!
articles.title: Review: Taco Bell - Cheesy Melty Grilled Steak Burrito

articles.description:
Heading into the fall, Domino's "Best Deal Ever" is back for a limited time. The promotion lets you buy "any pizza with any toppings" for $9.99 each (as long as it's not a Parmesan Stuffed Crust because that will cost you extra) at participating locations nationwide.

The $9.99 deal lets you choose from Hand Tossed, Handmade Pan, New York Style, Gluten Free, and Crunchy Thin Crust to go with various sauces and toppings.
The deal is available online only through the Domino's website or mobile app. It specifically excludes extra-large and specialty pizzas. According to the fine print, the maximum number of toppings for "any toppings" is seven (six if you're opting for a Handmade Pan or New York Style crust). The deal is available for delivery or carryout, although there is a minimum purchase requirement for delivery that varies by location.
Photo via Domino's.
Read more at Brand Eating!
articles.title: Domino's Brings Back "Any Pizza with Any Toppings for $9.99 Each" Deal

articles.description:
Tequila Lime Chicken is back at Moe's Southwest Grill for a limited time and gets a tangy twist in the form of a sprinkle of Tajin chili-lime seasoning. The Queso Crunch Taco is also back.

Tequila Lime Chicken was Moe's most popular limited-time offering last year and features white-meat chicken tossed in agave sauce with a smoky blend of lime, jalapeno, and garlic--now topped with a dash of Tajin. Tajin is also available to add to any entree with no extra charge.
Moe's Queso Crunch Taco is a crunchy taco shell wrapped in a soft tortilla with a layer of queso in between them. The shell is filled with Tequila Lime Chicken, Oaxaca cheese, pico de gallo, poblano crema, and Tajin.
As a promotion for its return, Moe Rewards Members can get a free Queso Crunch Taco with the purchase of any entree through September 7, 2025, at participating locations chain-wide.
Photo via Moe's Southwest Grill.
Read more at Brand Eating!
articles.title: Tequila Lime Chicken Returns to Moe's Southwest Grill

articles.description:
Dunkin' debuts its new Cereal N' Milk Latte as part of its 2025 fall menu, which also includes the Mixed Berry Daydream Refresher, a familiar slate of pumpkin items, and more.

The new Cereal N’ Milk Latte features a blend of espresso and cereal milk for a nostalgic marshmallow-cereal flavor. It's available hot or iced. It's also available as a Coolatta and a Blueberry Matcha Latte.
Created in partnership with music artist Sabrina Carpenter, Dunkin's Daydream Refreshers get a third flavor with Mixed Berry joining Mango and Strawberry varieties. The drinks feature a base (choose from green tea, black tea, lemonade, sparkling water, water, or oatmilk) and a flavor (the aforementioned Mixed Berry, Mango, or Strawberry), topped with cold foam. 
On the obligatory pumpkin side of things, the Pum…
articles.title: Dunkin's 2025 Fall Menu Includes New Cereal N' Milk Latte and More

articles.description:
Sonic is taking a different approach from pumpkin flavors for the fall 2025 season by introducing a new Salted Caramel Toffee Iced Coffee and Salted Caramel Croissant Bites.

The Salted Caramel Toffee Iced Coffee features iced cold brew coffee blended with salted caramel and buttery toffee, topped with cold foam and crunchy salted toffee pieces. The 20-ounce size is priced at a suggested $2.99.
The new Salted Caramel Croissant Bites are flaky, bite-sized pastries dusted with a caramel sugar blend. An order comes with four Bites for $1.99 (price may vary) and is part of Sonic's $1.99 Menu.
Both the Salted Caramel Toffee Iced Coffee and Croissant Bites are available exclusively through the Sonic App now, with a national launch planned for September 1, 2025.
Photo via Sonic.

Read more at Brand Eating!
articles.title: Sonic Launches New Salted Caramel Toffee Iced Coffee and Croissant Bites

articles.description:
Little Caesars is running a limited-time, online-only deal where you can get two large 1-topping pizzas for $4.99 each ($9.98 total) at participating locations nationwide.

The deal is available when ordering through the Little Caesars website or mobile app using the code "PIZZAPIZZA" through September 14, 2025.
The pricing is similar to the limited-time "More for $9.99" value menu that Little Caesars recently offered over the summer, but lets you choose from a wider selection of toppings.
The deal is slightly higher at $5.99 a pizza in some areas (including here in Los Angeles). The higher price also includes a slightly different code to input: "PIZZAPIZZA1". A custom 1-topping pizza normally costs $8.49 here (that makes for a discount of $2.50 per pizza).
Photo via Little Caesars.
Read more at Brand Eating!
articles.title: Little Caesars Offers Two Large 1-Topping Pizzas for $4.99 Each

articles.description:
Jack in the Box serves up new Hot Honey Spicy Strips and more for a limited time through September 21, 2025.

The new Hot Honey Spicy Chicken Strips feature the chain's returning crispy-fried, spicy chicken strips coated in hot honey and served with buttermilk ranch. It's available in 3- and 5-piece orders. Prices vary, but a 3-piece order costs $7.49 here in Los Angeles, while a 5-piece order is $9.49. You can also order Spicy Chicken Strips plain without hot honey.
Also back are Chicken & Waffle Sticks, which include two Crispy Chicken Strips (with buttermilk ranch for dipping) paired with three Waffle Sticks (with syrup for dipping). You can also order three Waffle Sticks a la carte.
Chicken & Waffle Sticks cost $7.49 in Los Angeles, while a 3-piece Waffle Sticks is $3.00.
Finally, Jack in the Box adds new Pumpkin Spice Mini Churros as a snackable dessert. An order includes five bite-sized, cinnamon-sugar-dusted churros filled with a sweet pumpkin spice filling. An order costs $2.69 here in Los Angeles.
Photo via Jack in the Box.
Read more at Brand Eating!
articles.title: Jack in the Box Serves Up New Hot Honey Spicy Chicken Strips and More

articles.description:
Dutch Bros brings back its Caramel Pumpkin Brulee and Cookie Butter Latte and introduces the new Candied Cherry Rebel for fall 2025.

The Caramel Pumpkin Brulee features pumpkin and salted caramel syrups finished with a layer of Soft Top (the chain's signature sweet cold foam), a pumpkin drizzle, and raw sugar sprinkles. You can get it as a breve, a latte, a Freeze, a cold brew, a shake, or a chai.
The Cookie Butter Latte features cookie butter and a swirl of cookie butter drizzle around the cup, topped with Soft Top and more cookie butter drizzle. It's available as a breve, latte, mocha, Freeze, or chai.
The Candied Cherry Rebel features a sweet cherry with almond flavor mixed with Dutch Bros' Rebel energy drink, finished with a cherry float. You can get it blended with ice, over ice, as a lemonade, or as a Fizz (non-caffeinated version)
The trio of drinks is available now at all Dutch Bros locations across the US, while supplies last.
Photo via Dutch Bros Coffee.
Read more at Brand Eating!
articles.title: Dutch Bros 2025 Fall Menu Arrives

articles.description:
Tyson Spooky Nuggets make a limited-time return for the 2025 Halloween season.

Available now for a limited time, while supplies last, at retailers nationwide, Spooky Nuggets are white-meat breaded chicken nuggets in three Halloween-themed shapes: pumpkins, bats, and ghosts.
They were first released nationally two years ago, following a popular giveaway of a limited batch via Instagram in 2022.
Prices vary by retailers, but a 27-oz bag costs $7.99 at a local supermarket here in Los Angeles.
Photo via Tyson.
Read more at Brand Eating!
articles.title: Tyson Spooky Nuggets are Back in Time for Halloween 2025

articles.description:
Crumbl brings back the Wafer Cookie featuring Kit Kat and more for its dessert rotation this week. As a back-to-school special, the cookie bakery chain is also offering a 4-pack of chocolate chip cookies for $9.99.

Here's what the menu looks like at Crumbl from August 25 through August 30, 2025:
- Wafer Cookie featuring Kit Kat - A warm classic cookie packed with Kit Kat pieces, topped with a layer of milk chocolate and more crushed Kit Kat pieces.
- Strawberry Pretzel Pie Cookie -  A chilled, buttery pie-inspired cookie rolled in pretzel pieces and topped with whipped cream cheese topping, house-made strawberry jam, and more pretzel pieces.
- Vanilla Crumb Cake Cookie featuring Golden Oreo - A warm cookie packed with Golden Oreo cookie pieces, topped with vanilla cream cheese frosting and more Golden Oreo cookie pieces. 
- Cookies & Cream Milkshake Cookie featuring Mini Oreo - A chilled cookies & cream milkshake-inspired cookie packed with Oreo cookie pieces, topped with an Oreo & vanilla buttercream and a Mini Oreo cookie. 
- S'mores Cookie - A warm graham cracker and milk chocolate chip cookie, topped with a melty marshmallow, chocolate drizzle, and buttery graham cracker crumbs.
- Chocolate Peanut Butter Chip Cookie - A warm chocolate cookie packed with peanut butter chips.
- Milk Chocolate Chip Cookie - A warm classic cookie packed with milk chocolate chips.
The 4 for $9.99 chocolate chip cookie deal can be milk chocolate or semi-sweet chocolate chip cookies, depending on that week's rotation.
Photo via Crumbl.
Read more at Brand Eating!
articles.title: Crumbl Bakes Kit Kat Cookies and More Through August 30, 2025

articles.description:
As summer nears its end, Hardee's introduces the new Sweet Cherry Shake and Sweet Cherry Lemonade. Additionally, the fast-food chain brings back its Original Bag value meal for a limited time.

The Sweet Cherry Shake features a blend of vanilla ice cream, milk, and red cherry flavor, while the Sweet Cherry Lemonade mixes "new and improved" handcrafted lemonade with cherry flavor. Both are available now through October 21, 2025.
The entree options for the Original Bag have been updated to include the Spicy Chicken Sandwich. It joins the Double Cheeseburger, Original Hot Ham 'N Cheese Sandwich, and Hand-Breaded Chicken Tender Wrap among the available choices. The Original Bag includes two entrees of your choice, small fries, and a small drink. It is available now through October 21, 2025, for $6.99 (may vary) at participating locations chain-wide.
Photo via Hardee's.
Read more at Brand Eating!
articles.title: Hardee's Welcomes New Cherry Shake and Lemonade; Brings Back Original Bag Value Meal

articles.description:
Freddy's Frozen Custard & Steakburgers will introduce the new Smoky Bacon Cheddar Stack burger and return its Pumpkin Pie Concrete to the menu on August 27, 2025, at participating locations nationwide.

The Smoky Bacon Cheddar Stack will be available through December 30, 2025, and features two hand-pressed steakburger patties, melted sharp cheddar cheese, four slices of applewood-smoked bacon, new Smoky Fry Sauce, and grilled onions, served on a toasted King's Hawaiian Bun.
The Pumpkin Pie Concrete will be available through November 25, 2025, and takes the chain's vanilla frozen custard and blends it with a whole slice of pumpkin pie (including the crust) before topping it all off with whipped cream and a sprinkle of cinnamon.
Photo via Freddy's Frozen Custard & Steakburgers.
Read more at Brand Eating!
articles.title: Freddy's Reveals New Smoky Bacon Cheddar Stack Burger and Returning Pumpkin Pie Concrete

articles.description:
Buffalo Wild Wings has brought back its Pick 6 meal for two, starting at $19.99, ahead of the 2025 fall football season.

The meal includes your pick of two entrees, two sides, and two fountain drinks.
The entree choices include 10 Boneless Wings (in your choice of flavor with dips and veggies), an All-American Cheeseburger, and three Crispy Chicken Dippers (Original or Spicy). The Buffalo Ranch Chicken Sandwich and Beer Cheese Cheesesteak are also available for an extra $3, while 10 Traditional Wings, a Triple-Bacon Cheeseburger, or a Honey BBQ Chicken Salad cost $5 more. 

The Spicy Chicken Dippers are a new addition to the special. They feature white-meat chicken tenders marinated in Desert Heat dry rub, tossed in a breading that includes three types of peppers, and then deep-fried. They're served with new B-Dub Dip (a creamy, tangy sauce) or a sauce of your choice. The Dippers can be tossed in a sauce or dry rub if you so choose.
Sides choices include fries, tots, or potato wedges.
The deal is available now at participating locations for a limited time. Prices may vary (it costs $24.99 here in Los Angeles).
Photo via Buffalo Wild Wings.
Read more at Brand Eating!
articles.title: $19.99 "Pick 6" Meal for Two is Back at Buffalo Wild Wings

articles.description:
Shake Shack brings its summer BBQ menu to a close with a deal where you can get either a free Summer BBQ Sandwich with an order of $10 or more placed through the chain's website, in-Shake kiosk, or mobile app, using the code "SUMMER", through Monday, September 1, 2025, at participating locations nationwide.

Shake Shack's Summer BBQ Sandwiches include the Smoky Classic BBQ Burger, the Carolina BBQ Burger with Fried Pickles, the Smoky Classic BBQ Chicken, and the Carolina BBQ Chicken with Fried Pickles.
The Smoky Classic BBQ Burger features a quarter-pound Angus beef patty, American cheese, applewood-smoked bacon, pickles, crispy-fried onions, and classic smoky BBQ sauce, served on a toasted potato bun.
The Carolina BBQ Burger with Fried Pickles is a quarter-pound Angus beef patty, pepper jack cheese, applewood-smoked bacon, fried pickle, and tangy-sweet Carolina-style BBQ sauce, served on a toasted potato bun.
The chicken versions of the burgers swap out the beef for a crispy-fried chicken breast filet.
Prices vary, but all four sandwiches normally cost $10.99 at my local Shake Shack here in Los Angeles, which means you can buy one of the sandwiches and get the second one for free during the promotion.
Photo via Shake Shack.
Read more at Brand Eating!
articles.title: Free Summer BBQ Sandwich with Order of $10 or More from Shake Shack

articles.description:
Chewy Chips Ahoy! x Stranger Things Limited-Edition Cookies feature a chocolaty base with fudge chips and a red strawberry-flavored filling. The filling is meant to peek through cracks in the cookies in a way reminiscent of the rift entrances in the TV series.

The suggested price for a 9.9 package is $5.79, but I received this courtesy of Chips Ahoy!.



The visual "rift" effect wasn't working on my batch of cookies. Rather than the red filling showing through, the cookies just had sealed cracks across the surface, which made them more crumbly and prone to breaking than the typical batch of Chewy Chips Ahoy! cookies.



The chocolaty base had the same soft and chewy texture as regular Chewy Chips Ahoy! but with a pleasant chocolaty flavor that gave it a brownie-like feel. The fudge chips were intermittent but delivered a deeper chocolaty flavor and smooth, melty texture.
The strawberry-flavored filling was similar in texture to the creme of an Oreo, only firmer. In terms of taste, it had an enjoyable and moderate strawberry flavor that went with the chocolate of the cookie.



Taken altogether, Chewy Chips Ahoy! x Stranger Things Limited-Edition Cookies were good but not great for me. I might think differently if I were a bigger fan of chocolate strawberries.
Nutritional Info - Chewy Chips Ahoy! x Stranger Things Cookies
Serving Size - Two cookies (31g)
Calories - 140
Fat - 6g (Saturated Fat - 3.5g)
Sodium - 110mg
Carbs - 21g (Sugar - 12g)
Protein - 1g
Read more at Brand Eating!
articles.title: Review: Chewy Chips Ahoy! x Stranger Things Cookies

articles.description:
Taco Bell is trying its own take on fajitas with a test of two new menu items, the Fajita Rolled Quesadilla and Fajita Street Chalupas, for a limited time at participating locations in the Milwaukee, WI area.

The two items showcase new seasoned fajita peppers & onions and a new fajita sauce.
The Fajita Rolled Quesadilla (pictured) features grilled marinated steak or slow-roasted chicken, "boldly seasoned" fajita peppers and onions, new fajita sauce, and a melted three-cheese blend that's folded in a flour tortilla, rolled, and then grilled. It carries a suggested price of $4.99.
Fajita Street Chalupas are sold in pairs. Each small Cheesy Street Chalupa shell is filled with grilled marinated steak or slow-roasted chicken, new fajita sauce, seasoned fajita peppers and onions, and a cilantro-onion blend. The suggested price per order is $5.99.
If you're curious, here's what the ingredient list for the new fajita sauce looks like: "Fajita Sauce: Soybean oil, water, distilled vinegar, jalapeno pepper (including dehydrated), roasted bell pepper, garlic (including dehydrated), egg yolk, garlic juice, contains 2% or less of: sugar, salt, ancho chili pepper*, xanthan gum, potassium sorbate and sodium benzoate (P), paprika, onion*, spice, propylene glycol alginate, citric acid, annatto extract (C), natural flavor, calcium disodium EDTA (PF). *dehydrated. Contains: Egg."
From the looks of it, the sauce is mayo-based with notes of jalapeno, bell pepper, and garlic.
Photo via Taco Bell.
Read more at Brand Eating!
articles.title: Taco Bell Testing New Fajita Rolled Quesadillas and Fajita Street Chalupas

articles.description:
Papa Johns is running a short-term deal where you can get two large 1-topping pizzas for $9.99 each (i.e., for $19.98 total) when ordering online.

The deal is available now through September 3, 2025, when ordering through the Papa Johns website or mobile app at participating locations nationwide. You can choose from Original, New York Style, or Thin crust.
It's priced slightly higher here in Southern California at $10.99 per pizza.
Other national deals at Papa Johns right now include:


$6.99 Papa Pairings - A long-running mix-and-match deal where you can choose from several menu items for $6.99 each when you buy two or more. The options include medium 1-topping New York Style or Original Crust pizzas, Boneless or Traditional Wings, Papadias, Breadsticks, Cheesesticks, Garlic Knots, and Desserts.
$11.99 Garlic 5-Cheese Crust Pizza - A new, limited-time pizza where you can get a large one with 1-topping for $11.99.


Photo via Papa Johns.
Read more at Brand Eating!
articles.title: Papa Johns Offers Two Large 1-Topping Pizzas for $9.99 Each

articles.description:
Trolli and Mountain Dew have teamed up to launch new Trolli x Mountain Dew Sour Brite Crawlers gummy candy and Mountain Dew Zero Sugar x Trolli Cherry Lemon soda.

There are three flavors of Trolli x Mountain Dew Sour Brite Crawlers in each bag: Original Citrus, Original Citrus x Cherry, and Original Citrus x Blue Raspberry. Each sour gummy worm features the signature citrus taste of Mountain Dew, complemented by the respective fruity Trolli flavors.
Mountain Dew Zero Sugar x Trolli Cherry Lemon offers the citrus flavor of Mountain Dew with the tangy taste of Trolli Cherry Lemon Sour Brite Crawlers. It is only available as a Zero Sugar version.
Trolli x Mountain Dew Sour Brite Crawlers can be found at select retailers nationwide beginning this month. They are available in three package sizes: 4.25 oz, 6.3 oz, and 12.3 oz.
Mountain Dew Zero Sugar x Trolli Cherry Lemon arrives first at Walmart starting August 25, 2025, with a nationwide rollout at other retailers beginning September 8, 2025. The soda is available in 20-oz bottles and 12-packs of 12-oz cans.
Photo via Trolli.
Read more at Brand Eating!
articles.title: New Trolli-Flavored Mountain Dew and Mountain Dew-Flavored Troilli Gummies

articles.description:
The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf has launched its 2025 fall menu, which includes new dairy-free Layered Lattes and the return of seasonal pumpkin beverages.

Here's what you can find at The Coffee Bean for this fall:
- New Pumpkin Layered Latte -Pumpkin syrup mixed with Oatly oat milk, topped with a frothy layer of Ethiopian and Bali Blue Moon Cold Brew, and a dusting of cinnamon.
- New Matcha Layered Latte - Oat milk mixed with vanilla syrup, topped with foamed restaurant-grade matcha.
- New Vanilla Layered Latte - Oat milk mixed with vanilla syrup, then topped with a frothy layer of Ethiopian and Bali Blue Moon Cold Brew, and a dusting of cinnamon.
- Pumpkin Ice Blended - Espresso, pumpkin syrup, milk, and ice blended together and topped with whipped cream and cinnamon. A "Pure" version made w…
articles.title: The Coffee Bean Welcomes 2025 Fall Menu

articles.description:
Pizza Hut gussies up its personal pizza offerings for a limited time with the debut of new Crafted Flatzz. The chain describes the new menu items as "crispy, hand-crafted personal pizzas."

Pizza Hut Crafted Flatzz have an elongated, somewhat oval crust that's cut into eight small slices. They feature five "artisanal recipes" (which brings to mind Domino's discontinued Artisan Pizzas):


Nashville Hot Chicken - Topped with crispy-fried boneless chicken pieces with spicy Nashville Hot seasoning, fresh onions, mozzarella, and pickle-flavored ranch sauce.
Chicken Bacon Ranch - Layered with crispy-fried boneless chicken pieces, applewood-smoked bacon, ultimate ranch sauce, mozzarella, and a parmesan oregano seasoning.
The Ultimate - Topped with pepperoni, Italian sausage, caramelized onions, roasted peppers, tomatoes, sweet marinara, and mozzarella.
Three Cheese - Topped with sweet marinara, mozzarella, parmesan, Romano, and oregano.
Pepperoni Duo - Topped with classic pepperoni, cup n’ crisp pepperoni, and a savory cheese blend seasoning, over mozzarella and sweet marinara.


Additional toppings can be added for an extra charge.
Crafted Flatzz are priced at a discounted rate of $5 before 5PM daily (prices after 5PM vary by location). They're available now through November 9, 2025, at participating locations nationwide.
Photo via Pizza Hut.
Read more at Brand Eating!
articles.title: Pizza Hut Introduces New Crafted Flatzz Personal Pizzas

articles.description:
Taco Bell's twist on the classic street taco, the Cheesy Street Chalupa, returns to the menu for a limited time ahead of fall 2025.

With two to an order, Cheesy Street Chalupas (you can find my previous review of them here) feature a small Chalupa shell (fried flatbread) and a small flour tortilla with a toasty layer of melted mozzarella and pepper jack between them. Inside the shell is a choice of slow-roasted chicken or grilled marinated steak, onions, cilantro, and Jalapeno Ranch sauce. The suggested price for an order is $5.49 (they're $6.49 near me in Los Angeles).
Other new Taco Bell menu items joining the Cheesy Street Chalupas include two $3 steak burritos and Mountain Dew Baja Midnight.
Nutritional Info - Taco Bell Steak Cheesy Street Chalupas
Calories - 410
Fat - 23g (Saturated Fat - 6g)

articles.title: Cheesy Street Chalupas Return to Taco Bell

articles.description:
Einstein Bros. Bagels welcomes fall 2025 with a new Oktoberfest-themed menu.

Available now, the limited-time menu includes:


New Oktoberfest Egg Sandwich - Cage-free eggs, smoky ham, bacon, Swiss cheese, deli mustard, and a new Beer Cheese Shmear, served on a toasted Pretzel Bagel. ​ 
New Pretzel Bagel Double Dipper - An easy-to-rip Pretzel Bagel served with a side of Beer Cheese Shmear and spicy brown mustard.
New Beer Cheese Shmear - Made with a combination of cream cheese and classic pub-style beer cheese. In addition to being featured in the Oktoberfest Egg Sandwich and with the Pretzel Bagel Double Dipper, you can also get it with any of the chain's bagels.


The Oktoberfest-themed menu is available through November 4, 2025, while supplies last
Photo via Einstein Bros. Bagels.
